verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: cast] [ARG1: doubt] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [C-ARG1: on the prospects for talks that are designed to head off a trade war between the United States and China] .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump cast doubt Wednesday on the prospects for talks that [V: are] designed to head off a trade war between the United States and China .
